column1: Is Zika or Malaria a concern in Pereira and around the coffee region?

Malaria is not a concern. There have been cases of zika in the coffee zone but its one of the least affected areas in the country. Especially if you stick to Manizales which is above the risk threshold due to altitude.Also cases fell so sharply from July that the government removed the epidemic status. Colombia has been praised internationally by the WTO for its rigorous screening and containment of zika. https:/â€¦
